learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate knowledge of advanced topics in relativistic quantum field (QFT) theory including Quantum Electrodynamics, Path integral techniques, Yang-Mills theory, spontaneous symmetry breaking, Renormalisation Group in QFT
Use the techniques of relativistic quantum field theory (QFT) to perform advanced calculations of, e.g., perturbative scattering amplitudes and correlation functions, renormalisation of QFTs
independently read, understand, and critically evaluate research papers on relativistic quantum field theory.
